# iosxe_interface_pim_ipv6 (Resource)

This resource can manage the Interface PIM IPv6 configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxe_interface_pim_ipv6" "example" {
  type        = "Loopback"
  name        = "100"
  pim         = true
  bfd         = false
  bsr_border  = false
  dr_priority = 10
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `type` (String) Interface type
  - Choices: `GigabitEthernet`, `TwoGigabitEthernet`, `FiveGigabitEthernet`, `TenGigabitEthernet`, `TwentyFiveGigE`, `FortyGigabitEthernet`, `HundredGigE`, `TwoHundredGigE`, `FourHundredGigE`, `Loopback`, `Vlan`, `Port-channel`, `Port-channel-subinterface/Port-channel`, `Tunnel`

### Optional

- `bfd` (Boolean) Configure BFD
- `bsr_border` (Boolean) Border of PIM BSR domain
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `dr_priority` (Number) PIM Hello DR priority
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `pim` (Boolean) PIM interface commands

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxe_interface_pim_ipv6.example "<type>,<name>"
```
